about_the_game:
Kamimai-cho is a rural town surrounded by mountains and the sea.
One day, Ponzu Fujita, a high school girl living there, is asked by Tomomi Nekoya, a junior high school student
Ponzu reluctantly takes her friend, Mayu Mayu, to a late-night school in Kirishita, where they play "Kokkuri-sama".
Ponzu reluctantly decides to play kokkuri-sama with her friend Mayuka Kirishita at school late at night.
However, from that day on, they frequently encounter mysterious phenomena.
What will happen to the girls? Will they make it through the summer in one piece?

It all depends on you...

Operation Method

.Some scenes require mouse operation.
[Arrow keys][Click where you want to go]: Move
[Shift]：Dash
[Z][Click where you want to search]: Search
[X] [Right click]: Menu
[Ctrl]: Skip a sentence
[tab]: Clear the message window temporarily

Summary

.Genre : Horror Adventure
Creator: Natsumikan
Tool: RPG Maker mv
Play Time : About 4 hours

Secondary Works and Live Action

.Secondary works are allowed as long as they are within the bounds of common sense. No report is required.
Live video is also allowed as long as it is not for the purpose of slander. No report is required.
